task: Add a hyperlink to text or a picture
steps: Select the text or picture that you want to add a hyperlink to.
Right-click on the selected text or picture and choose 'Hyperlink' from the context menu.
In the 'Insert Hyperlink' dialog box, enter the URL or file path you want to link to.
Click 'OK' to add the hyperlink to the selected text or picture.
Save the document to apply the changes.
